description: Update a job production plan material type quality control requirement.
permissions: User must be authorized to update the requirement via the related job production plan material type (delegated policy).
side_effects: Triggers job production plan recap generation after commit.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one of --note or --quality-control-classification must be provided. quality-control-classification must be unique within a job production plan material type and must belong to the same broker as the job production plan material type. job-production-plan-material-type relationship is create-only and cannot be updated.
